abstract: The agreement allows New York City’s government to purchase only the programs that workers need, rather than suites of software.
snippet: The agreement allows New York City’s government to purchase only the programs that workers need, rather than suites of software.
lead_paragraph: New York City has put the squeeze on Microsoft, negotiating a bulk software purchase that should lower technology costs for the city and give government workers access to more modern applications.

headline.main: Microsoft and New York in Software Deal
headline.print_headline: New York Strikes a Bulk Software Deal With Microsoft
